_meanings:
{@--1@} To go up to,
go towards, approach; to go to
some place or other, go or 
proceed; {#puroBisasre surasuMdarIjanEH#}  
<ls>Ki. 8. 4.</ls>

{@--3@} To
go or advance to meet (as at an
appointed place); {#suMdarIraBisasAra#}  
<ls>K. 58</ls>; <ls>Dk. 51</ls>, <ls n="Dk.">52</ls>, <ls n="Dk.">91</ls>; <ls>Śi. 6. 26.</ls>
